Posts.Content: bolymajo wrote: Good morning,  I had a lumpectomy on my left breast on Wednesday.  I had one on my right breast done in 2010 with the results coming back as DCIS.  I had a second opinion and was told no further treatment was necessary at the time.  I was to continue with my mammograms every 3 months for a year.  I had just come up on my year mammogram when they found calcifications in my left breast.  They said normally they would just watch the area but due to my history, they wanted to biopsy and remove them.  I was scheduled to go for a follow up on the 20th but they called me on Thursday and told me to come in on Monday.  Now I am in a panic because they moved up my appt.  I am scared to death that they have found cancer.  I wish my doctor could just gut my breasts and put in some fake ones and be done with it but I guess it doesn't work that way.  I am going to browse through all the information here to try and pass my time waiting for Monday.  I look forward to talking to everyone!
